channel.title: CVE Feed for Add Sidebar -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Add Sidebar -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34666|2024-09-16T19:56:43.711Z -- add%20sidebar -- add%20sidebar
item.description: The Add Sidebar WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the add parameter in the ~/wp_sidebarMenu.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 2.0.0.
